tool_description: Calculates optimal prices for products based on costs, pricing rules, market conditions, and business constraints.

product_ids.description: List of products to calculate prices for

pricing_rule_id.description: Identifier of the pricing rule to apply

cost_basis.description: Cost basis for calculations: current, average, or latest

market_conditions.description: Current market conditions: normal, high_demand, low_demand, or competitive

error_messages: Invalid product IDs: One or more product identifiers are not found in the catalog.
Pricing rule not found: The specified pricing_rule_id does not exist.
Missing cost data: Cost information is not available for one or more products.
Invalid cost basis: cost_basis must be one of [current, average, latest].
Invalid market conditions: market_conditions must be one of [normal, high_demand, low_demand, competitive].
Calculation failed: Unable to calculate prices due to insufficient data or rule conflicts.
usage: Provide product_ids and pricing_rule_id to calculate prices. Optionally specify cost_basis and current market_conditions to refine calculations.

calculation_timestamp.description: When the price calculations were performed

calculated_prices.description: Calculated prices for each requested product

margin_percentages.description: Resulting margin percentages for each product

calculation_summary.description: Summary of the pricing calculation results
